Notice during package installation that a package with the same name is already installed.

Locale.String: A package with the name %0:s is already installed. Do you want to uninstall it and install the new one?

String.Description: Notice during keyboard layout installation that a keyboard layout with the same name is already installed.

Locale.String: A keyboard with the name '%0:s' is already installed. If you continue, it will be uninstalled before the new one is installed. Continue?

String.Description: Notice of need to uninstall an entire package

Locale.String: The keyboard '%0:s' is part of package '%1:s'. You must uninstall the entire package. Continue?

String.Description: Notice of user ineligibility to install/uninstall keyboards

Locale.String: You can only install or uninstall keyboards as Administrator. Use Control Panel to select languages for use as a normal user.

String.Description: Notice of surrogate setting change requiring Windows restart

Locale.String: Changing the setting of Surrogates requires Windows to be restarted. Do you want to restart Windows now?

String.Description: Notice of lack of introductory help

Locale.String: The package or keyboard '%0:s' does not include any introductory help.

String.Description: Notice of lack of configuration settings for an addin

Locale.String: The selected addin does not include any configurable settings.

String.Description: Notice of unsupported operating system

Locale.String: This operating system is not supported. Please contact Tavultesoft for more details.

String.Description: Notice of succesful licence activation

Locale.String: Your licence has been successfully activated.

String.Description: File name of the help file - must be .chm format. The locale folder will be checked first for the file
Notice of help file not found

Locale.String: The help file $(SKOnlineHelpFile) could not be found.

Keyboard with an ANSI or Codepage encoding
Keyboard with a Unicode encoding

Locale.String: Uniscribe is not currently installed on your computer

Locale.String: Keyman Uniscribe Manager is required to enable display of your language

String.Description: Notice - Keyman Desktop Light keyboard limit

Locale.String: You can only load 2 keyboards at a time with &Name; Light. Untick the boxes at the right hand side of the list to unload the keyboards you don't currently need, or upgrade to &Name; Professional to remove this restriction.

String.Description: Notice - Keyman Desktop Light character map limit

Locale.String: The Character Map Tool is available only in &Name; Professional.

Are you sure you want to uninstall package %0:s?
%1:s

String.Description: Text embedded in SKUninstallPackage when fonts are ready for uninstall.

Locale.String: The following fonts will also be uninstalled: %0:s.

String.Description: Request for confirmation that the present activation method is desired

Locale.String: Do you want to activate $(SKShortApplicationTitle) online now with licence number %0:s? If you click No, you can choose from alternate activation methods.

String.Description: Request to build Unicode Chracter Map database

Locale.String: The Character Map has a database of characters that needs to be built before it can be used. Build it now?

String.Description: Error deleting Unicode Character Map database

Locale.String: The Unicode Character database could not be deleted for a rebuild. Error details are: %0:s

String.Description: Error creating Unicode Character Map database

Locale.String: The Unicode Character database could not be created and has been disabled. Error details are: %0:s

String.Description: Error loading Unicode Character Map database. Request to rebuild.

Locale.String: The Unicode character database did not load successfully (%0:s). Rebuild it now?

String.Description: Displayed during activation process if the licence number is invalid

Locale.String: The licence number you entered is not valid (the error message received was: %0:s)

String.Description: Error connecting during activation

Locale.String: Unable to connect to tavultesoft.com to request activation code (the error message received was: %0:s)

String.Description: Error in validation of licence key

Locale.String: Your licence was not successfully validated: %0:s

String.Description: General URL error

Locale.String: Cannot activate browser or email program for this URL.

String.Description: Keyboard printing error

Locale.String: The keyboard could not be printed successfully. Please save to a web page and print manually.

String.Description: Error from Keyman Desktop failing to start keyman.exe due to an access denied or file not found

Locale.String:
&Name; failed to start. Please check your security settings to make sure that the program keyman.exe is allowed to start before continuing. The error returned was:
"%0:s"
Do you want to try and start &Name; again now?

String.Description: Warning upon starting debugging in the Options tab

Locale.String:
&Name; debug information will be stored in a text file called keymanlog\system.log on your desktop. You should exit &Name; before reading or deleting this file.
WARNING: This file can grow large very quickly. Enabling debugging will slow down your system and should only be done if advised by Tavultesoft support.
PRIVACY WARNING: Please note that the debug logfile records all keystrokes that you type. You should only turn on the debug log for the duration of a debugging or diagnostic session, and delete the [desktop]\keymanlog\system.log file as soon as possible.

String.Description: Request to add editing support to a specific version of Microsoft office
Local name for Microsoft Office 2000
Local name for Microsoft Office XP
Local name for Microsoft Office 2003
Local name for Microsoft Office 2007
Local name for Microsoft Office 2010
Shown when Keyman wants to link a Windows language to a Keyman keyboard so that when one is selected by the user, the other automatically switches in
Shown when Keyman wants to install a Windows language and link it to a Keyman keyboard so that when one is selected by the user, the other automatically switches in

Locale.String: Install language %0:s and link to Keyman keyboard %1:s

String.Description: Tutorial Hintbar 1 paragraph 1a
Tutorial Hintbar 1 paragraph 1b

Locale.String: at the bottom right of your screen to begin typing in your language

String.Description: Tutorial Hintbar 1 icon click hint

Locale.String: Don't click on this icon. Look for a smaller version of the icon near the clock, usually at the bottom right hand corner of your screen.

String.Description: Tutorial Hintbar 2 paragraph 1

Locale.String: Now choose a keyboard layout from the menu that is displayed

String.Description: Tutorial Hintbar 3 paragraph 1

Locale.String: The On Screen Keyboard has now appeared. You can type by clicking on the On Screen Keyboard or by using your hardware keyboard.

String.Description: Tutorial Hintbar 3 paragraph 2

Locale.String: Getting Started has chosen a good font for your language automatically. You can choose other fonts at the right hand side of the screen.

String.Description: Tutorial Hintbar 4 paragraph 1a

Locale.String: Sorry, you didn't choose a keyboard layout. To start typing in your language, click on the &Name; icon

String.Description: Tutorial Hintbar 4 paragraph 1b

Locale.String: at the bottom right of your screen.

String.Description: Tutorial Hintbar 5 paragraph 1

Locale.String: Good job! Did you know that you can also type in Word, OpenOffice, Internet Explorer, or any other program, in exactly the same way? Just click the &Name; icon to choose your keyboard, and start typing.

String.Description: Tutorial Hintbar 5 paragraph 2

Locale.String: When you have finished typing here, click the Close button at the top right of the screen to exit the Getting Started Screen
